channel.title: Flutter on Bluepie's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Flutter on Bluepie's Journal

item.title: Trying Out Flutter 3.0
item.description: Been a while..hope everything is going well. PersonalNote: Joined Verizon on May 9th 2022…reason for missing posts, was stuck in documentations, kts’..etc. I have already met my new team..this will be a great journey for me Flutter 3.0 Flutter 3.0 is a major update to the Flutter SDK and I decided to try it out. Supports all platforms this is a huge claim..lets try this out shall we? Choosing a usecase that would be useful for every platform I sit infront of my computer all day…I would like to get reminded to take a break every now and then.
